channel.title: NEW NPC list?
channel.description: I have NPC codes up to about 8000 or so, but I'd like a list with NPCs including Dungeoneering NPCs and possibly Conquest (in other words, NPCs from 25 August 2010 or later). With the new Conquest and Dungeoneering NPCs, I believe the list should have over 12,000 NPCs on it. If someone could give me a recent list or show me how to get one, that would be great. Thanks!

item.title: NEW NPC list?
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

Does anyone know the newest client available that also has a list of NPCs included?

Read full topic

item.title: NEW NPC list?
item.dc:creator: @i_have_an_ax i have an ax
item.description:
@i_have_an_ax wrote:

[quote=“Killea, post:2, topic:358650”][quote author=i have an ax link=topic=455155.msg3332729#msg3332729 date=1283626552]
I have NPC codes up to about 8000 or so, but I’d like a list with NPCs including Dungeoneering NPCs and possibly Conquest (in other words, NPCs from 25 August 2010 or later). With the new Conquest and Dungeoneering NPCs, I believe the list should go have over 12,000 NPCs on it. If someone could give me a recent list or show me how to get one, that would be great. Thanks!
[/quote]

Look in your client for the models, you will see the NPC id their to.

As far as i know, there isnt a list yet for the new NPC’s[/quote]

I looked in a client I downloaded. In the ‘models’ folder, all I see is a bunch of random files called 11232.dat (or something similar to that), and something called “Ints”. I don’t see an NPC list anywhere. Also, how do I open .dat files?

Read full topic

item.title: NEW NPC list?
item.dc:creator: @Killea Killea
item.description:
@Killea wrote:

i have an ax:

I have NPC codes up to about 8000 or so, but I’d like a list with NPCs including Dungeoneering NPCs and possibly Conquest (in other words, NPCs from 25 August 2010 or later). With the new Conquest and Dungeoneering NPCs, I believe the list should go have over 12,000 NPCs on it. If someone could give me a recent list or show me how to get one, that would be great. Thanks!

Look in your client for the models, you will see the NPC id their to.

As far as i know, there isnt a list yet for the new NPC’s
